code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL="http://localhost:5000/api/quizzes";export const getQuizzes=async()=>{const res=await axios.get(API_URL);return res.data;};export const getQuizById=async id=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id));return res.data;};export const submitQuiz=async(id,answers)=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id,"/submit"),{answers});return res.data;};
